sourcesContent: import{useRef as o,useEffect as i,useCallback as f}from"react";let l=Symbol();function p(n,t=!0){return Object.assign(n,{[l]:t})}function T(...n){let t=o(n);i(()=>{t.current=n},[n]);let c=f(e=>{for(let u of t.current)u!=null&&(typeof u=="function"?u(e):u.current=e)},[t]);return n.every(e=>e==null||(e==null?void 0:e[l]))?void 0:c}export{p as optionalRef,T as useSyncRefs};
